Name: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
About the game: Van is a powerful demon lord, but he has a problem. His power has been sealed, and he's been banished to live in the world of mortals! Lucky for him, his devoted ally Aira is there to help him regain his strength and return to his former glory. And who knows? Maybe he can make some new friends along the way! Features: A Resource Management Adventure Game Lighthearted and Fun Story Quest System Leveling System Friendship System
